TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IComponentDiscoveryService

summary.span: 在設計階段啟用元件的列舉。

span.span: Enables enumeration of components at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設實作介面可讓在工具箱中元件的設計階段列舉型別。The default implementation of the interface enables design-time enumeration of components in the Toolbox. 您可以提供自訂的實作，可在設計階段使用的其他型別列舉。You could provide a custom implementation that enumerates across other types available at design time. 例如，您的實作無法列舉有特定的設計工具中的元件。For example, your implementation could enumerate the components that are present in a particular designer. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用衍生自的所有類型中找出型別。The following code example demonstrates how to use to find all the types that derive from the type. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerServices#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerServices/CS/Form1.cs#13)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerServices#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerServices/VB/Form1.vb#13)]

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.ICollection GetComponentTypes (System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost designerHost, Type baseType);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.ICollection GetComponentTypes(class System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost designerHost, class System.Type baseType) cil managed
Public Function GetComponentTypes (designerHost As IDesignerHost, baseType As Type) As ICollection

param.name: designerHost
param.span: 提供設計階段服務的設計工具主應用程式。

span.span: The designer host providing design-time services.

param.name: baseType
param.span: 指定要擷取之元件的基底型別 (Base Type)。

span.span: The base type specifying the components to retrieve.

summary.span: 取得可用元件型別的清單。

span.span: Gets the list of available component types.
The list of available component types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會擷取可用的元件類型，也就是類型的清單實作介面。The method retrieves the list of available component types, which are types implementing the interface. 如果`baseType`參數是`null`，擷取所有的元件; 否則只有元件型別衍生自`baseType`會傳回。If the `baseType` parameter is `null`, all components are retrieved; otherwise, only component types derived from `baseType` are returned. 當您要傳入的值`designerHost`參數，型別解析範圍為`designerHost`。When you pass in a value for the `designerHost` parameter, type resolution is scoped to `designerHost`. 這表示，如果沒有其型別是在磁碟上，且不在全域組件快取中，其型別將無法透過載入`designerHost`。This means that if there is a whose type is on disk, and not in the global assembly cache, its type will fail to load through `designerHost`. 如果您要傳入`null`如`designerHost`，它會傳回可以從全域組件快取查詢的所有型別或方法。If you pass in `null` for `designerHost`, it returns all types that can be queried from the global assembly cache or the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來尋找所有型別衍生自型別。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to find all the types that derive from the type. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerServices#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerServices/CS/Form1.cs#13)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerServices#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerServices/VB/Form1.vb#13)]
